page.title: 16DARBY AND JOAN CLUB,N.KYME
page.content: The{Darby and Joan Club}meets once a month. It is for men and women over 60 years old so they can get together for a chat,make new friends and get them selves out for a while.They play Bingo or cards and have a raffle. Anyone can bring a small useful gift like a tin of fruit or half a dozen eggs. Tea is provided which costs 30p. This is usually sandwiches,sausage rolls,cake and tarts. They go on outings to the seaside or to the country. Every spring,they have a garden fete to raise money. Sometimes they take part in village concerts and sing to the audience. At Christmas they have a party and when it is a members birthday they receive a card from the Darby and Joan Club,so they never feel left out.
